1 # [libcbor](https://github.com/PJK/libcbor)
2 
3 [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/PJK/libcbor.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/PJK/libcbor)
4 [![Documentation Status](https://readthedocs.org/projects/libcbor/badge/?version=latest)](https://readthedocs.org/projects/libcbor/?badge=latest)
5 
6 **libcbor** is a C library for parsing and generating [CBOR](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7049), the general-purpose schema-less binary data format.
7 
8 ## Main features
9  - Complete RFC conformance
10  - Robust C11 implementation
11  - Layered architecture offers both control and convenience
12  - Flexible memory management
13  - Proper handling of UTF-8
14  - Full support for streams & incremental processing
15  - Extensive documentation and test suite
16  - No runtime dependencies, small footprint
17 
18 ## Documentation
19 Get the latest documentation at [libcbor.readthedocs.org](http://libcbor.readthedocs.org/)
20 
21 ## Contributions
22 
23 All bug reports and contributions are welcome. Please see https://github.com/PJK/libcbor for more info.
24
